LoopWithTooManyJumpStatements:RemoveMediaUseCase.kt$RemoveMediaUseCase$for (mediaId in mediaIds) { if (!TextUtils.isEmpty(mediaId)) { // make sure the MediaModel exists val mediaModel = try { mediaStore.getMediaWithLocalId(Integer.valueOf(mediaId)) ?: continue } catch (e: NumberFormatException) { AppLog.e(AppLog.T.MEDIA, "Invalid media id: $mediaId") continue } // also make sure it's not being uploaded anywhere else (maybe on some other Post, // simultaneously) if (mediaModel.uploadState != null && mediaUtils.isLocalFile(mediaModel.uploadState.toLowerCase(Locale.ROOT)) && !uploadService.isPendingOrInProgressMediaUpload(mediaModel)) { dispatcher.dispatch(MediaActionBuilder.newRemoveMediaAction(mediaModel)) } } }
